about.description:
Evaluation of k-space integrals of Berry curvature, orbital moment and
derived quantities by means of MLWFs or tight-binding models. Compared
to postw90.x part of Wannier90 code, it has extended functional and
improved performance
about.summary: Advanced tool for Wannier interpolation and integration of k-space integrals

about.description:
Evaluation of k-space integrals of Berry curvature, orbital moment and
derived quantities by means of MLWFs or tight-binding models. Compared
to postw90.x part of Wannier90 code, it has extended functional and
improved performance
about.summary: Advanced tool for Wannier interpolation and integration of k-space integrals

name: wannierberri
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "wannierberri" %}
{% set version = "0.7.2" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/stepan-tsirkin/wannier-berri/archive/master.tar.gz
  sha256: 8e5ba5ad9e17767d2b2985de50a1ecf10c5a604af1471034aa01ffb18628d595
  patches:
    - indentation.patch

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - lazy-property
    - pyfftw
    - colorama
    - termcolor
    - pyfiglet
  run:
    - python
    - numpy
    - scipy
    - lazy-property
    - colorama
    - termcolor
    - pyfiglet
    - pyfftw

test:
  imports:
    - wannierberri
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: http://wannier-berri.org
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Advanced tool for Wannier interpolation and integration of k-space integrals'

  description: |
    Evaluation of k-space integrals of Berry curvature, orbital moment and 
    derived quantities by means of MLWFs or tight-binding models. Compared 
    to postw90.x part of Wannier90 code, it has extended functional and 
    improved performance
  doc_url: http://wannier-berri.org
  dev_url: https://github.com/stepan-tsirkin/wannier-berri

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
